member.name: T:DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.DraftCleanupService
member.summary: Background service that periodically cleans up expired drafts Runs every hour to remove drafts that have passed their expiration time

member.name: M:DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.DraftCleanupService.#ctor(System.IServiceProvider,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.DraftCleanupService})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of DraftCleanupService

member.name: M:DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.DraftCleanupService.ExecuteAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes the background task Runs continuously, cleaning up expired drafts every hour

member.name: T:DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.DraftService
member.summary: Implementation of IDraftService using SQL Server for storage Provides server-side draft management for FormEditorV5

member.name: M:DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.DraftService.#ctor(DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Data.DynamicFormsDbContext,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.DraftService})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of DraftService

member.name: T:DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.IDraftService
member.summary: Service for managing server-side form module drafts Provides temporary storage for modules being edited in FormEditorV5

member.name: M:DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.IDraftService.SaveDraftAsync(System.String,DynamicForms.Core.Entities.FormModule)
member.summary: Save or update a draft for a specific user and module Creates new draft if none exists, updates existing draft otherwise Automatically extends expiration to 24 hours from now
member.param: User ID who owns the draft

member.name: M:DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.IDraftService.GetDraftAsync(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieve a draft for a specific user and module Returns null if no draft exists or if draft has expired
member.param: User ID who owns the draft
member.returns: FormModule if found and not expired, otherwise null

member.name: M:DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.IDraftService.DeleteDraftAsync(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete a specific draft for a user and module Typically called when user explicitly saves the module (converts draft to permanent)
member.param: User ID who owns the draft
Module ID of the draft to delete

member.name: M:DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.IDraftService.CleanupExpiredDraftsAsync
member.summary: Remove all expired drafts from the database Called by DraftCleanupService background task every hour

member.name: T:DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.IModuleService
member.summary: Service for managing form modules with business logic Handles CRUD operations, multi-tenant filtering, and draft cleanup

member.name: M:DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.IModuleService.GetModulesAsync(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Get all modules for a specific opportunity (multi-tenant filtered)
member.returns: List of modules with summary information

member.name: M:DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.IModuleService.GetModuleAsync(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get a single module with all fields
member.returns: Full FormModule or null if not found or unauthorized

member.name: M:DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.IModuleService.CreateModuleAsync(System.String,DynamicForms.Core.Entities.FormModule)
member.summary: Create a new module

member.name: M:DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.IModuleService.UpdateModuleAsync(System.String,DynamicForms.Core.Entities.FormModule)
member.summary: Update an existing module Also deletes the draft for this module after successful save

member.name: M:DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.IModuleService.DeleteModuleAsync(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete a module Also deletes the draft for this module

member.name: T:DynamicForms.EntityFramework.Services.ModuleService
member.summary: Implementation of IModuleService with business logic Handles CRUD operations, multi-tenant filtering, and draft cleanup
